description: Yury Dmitriyev says the case was politically motivated in reaction to his work as a Stalin scholar.
title: Russian historian jailed in controversial sex abuse case
title_page: Russian historian jailed in controversial sex abuse case - BBC News
maintext: In fact, officials, including historians from the Russian Military Historical Society, have started to claim that the site at Sandarmokh - where Dmitriyev and his team had spent years recovering human remains and documenting the identity of more than 6,000 people executed - actually contained the remains of murdered Red Army prisoners-of-war, not political prisoners of the Stalin-era repressions.
